global.debugger_title: Debuggers have access to certain dev commands like /debug.
global.trusted_title: Trusted players have restricted access to certain staff commands like /kick and /ban.
global.staff_title: Staff Members have access to all staff commands.
global.senior_staff_title: Senior Staff have access to all staff commands and certain super admin commands like /advanced_metagame.
global.super_title: Super-Admins have access to all commands, excluding developer commands.
global.developer_title: Developers have unrestricted access to all available commands.

global.read_out_loud: Read text out loud via TTS.

global.server_timeout: Server ID is cached for 5 minutes

search.custom: * By default returns all rows where the column contains your search. You can use operators such as: = (equals), != (does not equal), > (greater than), < (less than) or ! (doesn't contain) at the beginning of your search string. You can also search for multiple values by separating them with a line (e.g: "search1|search2").

global.support_markdown: Most basic markdown syntax is supported. Click to learn more.

staff_statistics.title: Staff Statistics
staff_statistics.description: Some general statistics about staff members.
staff_statistics.footer: Your actions contribute to the success and growth of OP-FW. Through the reliable systems of OP-Framework, your efforts are recognized and celebrated as part of our collective progress. Teamwork drives achievement, and dedication builds excellence. Glory to the OP-FW!
staff_statistics.description_chinese: A detailed record of your contributions to societal harmony and progress, monitored by the Party for the benefit of all. Remember, every action reflects your dedication to the collective future.
staff_statistics.footer_chinese: Every action you take is a testament to your loyalty and commitment to the Party. Under the watchful eyes of the system, your contributions are recorded and celebrated as part of our collective progress. Obedience ensures harmony, and vigilance guarantees prosperity. Glory to the CCP!
staff_statistics.level_0_description: Though you have set foot upon the staff path, your potential remains dormant and unshaped. You glean knowledge from the whispers of mentors and watch the realm's energies swirl around you with curiosity. The seeds of greatness lie within your grasp, waiting for the moment you step forward to claim them.
staff_statistics.level_1_description: At last, the first sparks of staff magic shimmer in your hands, guiding your responses to minor server troubles. You stand ready to calm the occasional squabble or quell fleeting unrest, eager to prove your worth. The arcane bond grows stronger with each call for assistance, igniting the promise of higher mastery.
staff_statistics.level_2_description: Embracing the subtle currents that shape the server, you deftly juggle reports and disciplinary steps with emerging skill. Chaos trembles as your collected demeanor and swift resolutions keep the peace intact. Each action weaves you deeper into the realmâ€™s tapestry, fortifying your resolve to safeguard its harmony.
staff_statistics.level_3_description: Your command of arcane wards and banishing incantations anchors the server in a steady calm. Troublemakers find themselves thwarted by your vigilance, and your glowing staff stands as a beacon of authority. Even in the face of lurking shadows, your unwavering dedication transforms turmoil into triumph.
staff_statistics.level_4_description: From the darkest corners, you stand watch, attuned to the faintest flicker of mischief that threatens the realm. Swift retributions and precise interventions embody your role as a stalwart guardian, ensuring no foe lingers long in your domain. The veil between order and chaos remains safely mended under your vigilant gaze.
staff_statistics.level_5_description: Celestial forces guide your judgments, empowering you to enforce harmony with cosmic grace. The realm looks to you for balanced decrees, trusting in your ability to subdue conflict and uplift those in need. With every day, your mastery of astral energies grows, illuminating the way for staff and players alike.
staff_statistics.level_6_description: Your staff resonates with infernal might, banishing disruptive forces with swift precision. Fear ripples among the unruly at the mere mention of your name, for they know your wrath spares no one who dares upset the realm. Yet in wielding such power, you remain mindful of justice, ensuring it is meted out fairly and decisively.
staff_statistics.level_7_description: Radiating divine authority, you marshal the realmâ€™s defenders and quell unrest before it can take hold. Whispers of your legendary interventions travel far, solidifying your status as a guiding star for all. In your capable hands, the serverâ€™s fate remains bright, unyielding against the darkness beyond.
staff_statistics.level_8_description: You walk the boundary between light and dark, reading the hidden threads of chaos before they erupt. Swift freezes and expert kicks prove your devotion to maintaining peace, leaving no quarter for lingering threats. The synergy of your subtlety and might ensures that all who dwell in your domain do so in harmony.
staff_statistics.level_9_description: Through countless conflicts, your mastery has surpassed mortal limitations, blending strategic cunning with an unwavering moral compass. Trolls and troublemakers vanish in your wake, each ban or mute an artful stroke of balanced retribution. In this exalted station, your dedication stands as a testament to the realmâ€™s unbreakable resilience.
staff_statistics.level_10_description: Legends speak of your transcendent ascension, a beacon whose mere presence hushes the most turbulent storms. The brilliance of your staffâ€™s energy resonates through every corner, forging unbreakable unity among those under your watch. At this pinnacle of mortal power, you shape the realmâ€™s destiny with each resolute decree.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.no_economy_recorded: No economy statistics recorded yet. (Recorded once every hour)
statistics.casino_details: Combined revenue from all available games in the casino.
statistics.pdm_details: Combined revenue from all PDM upfront and finance sales.
statistics.tuner_details: Combined revenue from all Tunershop vehicle sales.
statistics.edm_details: Combined revenue from all EDM purchases.
statistics.gem_details: Combined revenue from all Gemstone sales.
statistics.pawn_details: Combined revenue from all Pawn Shop sales.
statistics.drugs_details: Combined revenue from all Drug sales.
statistics.store_details: Combined revenue from all Store sales (grocery, tool, pd, ems, etc.).
statistics.paycheck_details: Combined amount of all received hourly paychecks.
statistics.robberies_details: Amount of store, bank and jewelry store robberies started.
statistics.joins_details: Amount of users that joined the server.
statistics.ooc_details: Amount of local and global ooc messages sent.
statistics.robbed_peds_details: Combined money stolen by robbing peds.
statistics.airlifts_details: Amount of airlifts to the hospital.
statistics.material_vendor_details: Combined revenue from all materials sold at the material vendor.
statistics.special_imports_details: Combined revenue from all special imports sales.
statistics.bills_details: Combined amount of all paid bills.
statistics.dumpsters_details: Amount of items found in dumpsters.
statistics.mining_explosions_details: Amount of gems that exploded while being mined.
statistics.daily_refresh_details: Combined amount of all paid daily activities refreshes.
statistics.atm_withdraw_fee_details: Combined amount of all ATM withdrawal fees.
statistics.bus_revenue_details: Combined revenue from all money earned through the bus driver job.
statistics.found_items_details: Combined revenue from all items found with a magnifying glass.
statistics.ls_customs_details: Combined revenue from all LS Customs purchases.
statistics.shots_fired_details: Amount of shots fired (that dealt damage) from all weapons that shoot bullets (no melee, etc.).
statistics.lucky_wheel_details: Amount of times the lucky wheel was spun.
statistics.crashes_daily_details: Amount of full game crashes or timeouts on a daily basis.
statistics.crashes_hourly_details: Amount of full game crashes or timeouts on an hourly basis.
statistics.money_logs_details: Compare different money logs in a graph for the last 30 days.
statistics.economy_stats_details: Compare economy statistics in a graph for the last 30 days.
statistics.player_stats_details: Compare player statistics in a graph.
statistics.fps_stats_details: Compare FPS statistics in a graph. FPS averages are calculated with at least 10 minutes of data. The minimum and maximum represent the minimum and maximum average FPS a player was experiencing at that time.

ban.ban_warning: You are now issuing a ban for this player. Make sure you are well within reason to do this. It's never a bad idea to double check with an additional staff member!
ban.creator: Creator
ban.no_reason: This ban is missing a ban reason
ban.title: Bans

show.schedule_info: At the selected date, the ban will automatically be removed at 12 AM UTC.
show.scheduled_details: Ban is scheduled for removal on {0} UTC ({1}).
show.original_ban: This is a smurf ban, click here to show the original ban.
show.accuracy_title: {0} of {1} detections were banned in the last 14 days.
show.confirmed_accuracy_title: Due to the way this detection is built, there is no way for false positives to occur. This ban should not be removed.
show.high_accuracy_title: This detection is built in a way that false positives are highly unlikely. Make sure you are 100% certain this ban is false before removing it.
show.unmute_confirm: Are you sure you want to unmute this player?
show.hwid_ban: Linked to banned player by Hardware-ID.
show.multiple_bans_details: Player has {0} active bans. Players with multiple active bans can't be scheduled for unban and have to be unbanned manually. Multiple bans on one player usually means that player has linked to another player which automatically copies their ban(s) to this player. To remove all bans on this player, you may have to unban them multiple times and unlink them from each other.
show.unlink_confirm: Are you sure you want to unlink these players from each other? Only do this when you are certain they are not the same person / ban evading.
show.discord_linked: This discord account is locked to this user.
show.streamer_exception_title: This player is allowed to play while actively streaming on `{0}`.
show.global_title: Player is banned on {0} OP-FW servers.
show.opfw_banned: Player is globally banned from all OP-FW servers.
show.anti_cheat_has_screenshot: Anti-Cheat event has a screenshot attached.
show.unban_system_confirm: This player was automatically banned by the system. Are you sure you want to remove this ban? Type "confirm" to confirm.
show.no_link: No linked accounts for this identifier
show.no_warnings: This player has not received any warnings or notes.
show.no_panel_logs: This player has no panel logs.
show.damage_logs_by: Show who was damaged by this player
show.damage_logs: Show who this player was damaged by
show.no_system_info: Failed to load system ban info.
show.system_details: The {0} detection was triggered {1} times in the last 6 months, affecting {2} players (about {3}x per player). {4} of which are still banned and {5} of which are not. This results an estimated accuracy of about {6}%.
show.system_no_details: The {0} detection has not been triggered in the last 6 months.
show.system_caption: Players detected by this detection. Green are still banned, red are not.
show.source_bans_details: Amount of bans issued by this staff member in the last 30 days.
show.source_notes_details: Amount of notes, warnings and strikes issued by this staff member in the last 30 days.
show.source_helpful_details: Amount of "helpful" actions performed by this staff member in the last 30 days. This means using commands that are generally more used to help OTHER players: /tp_player, /tp_here, /tp_to, /spectate, /staffpm, /wipe, /freeze, /unfreeze, /job, /reset_job, /revive and /revive_range (others only) with commands more commonly used to troll other staff like /slap and /damage excluded.
show.kick_confirm: Are you sure you want to kick this player from the server?
show.delete_character: Are you sure you want to delete this character?
show.delete_warning: Are you sure you want to delete this strike/warning/note?
show.delete_selected_warnings: Are you sure you want to delete the {0} selected warnings? This cannot be undone!
show.unload_msg_description: This message will be displayed on the character selection screen.
show.unload_confirm: Are you sure you want to unload this players character? This will send them to the character selection screen.
show.revive_confirm: Are you sure you want to revive this player?
show.remove_ban_exception_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove this players twitch ban exception?
show.invalid_twitch_profile: Invalid twitch profile link. Please enter a valid twitch profile link (e.g.: https://twitch.tv/myprofile).
show.whitelist_confirm: Are you sure you want to whitelist this player?
show.unwhitelist_confirm: Are you sure you want to un-whitelist this player?
show.average_ping: Average ping to the server in milliseconds.
show.stretch_res: Player is playing a {0} aspect ratio on a {1} resolution. (Stretched-Resolution)
show.using_vpn: Player was using a VPN when they connected to the server.
show.suspicious_spoof: Most likely using a spoofer. These kind of spoofers are often used by modders and ban evaders.
show.playtime: {0} played in total, {1} of which was in the last 4 weeks.

metadata.title: Log-Entry metadata
metadata.secondary_unknown: The secondary death reason is unknown.
metadata.secondary_player: The player was killed by another player with the server-id {0}.
metadata.secondary_npc: The player was killed by an NPC.
metadata.secondary_vehicle: The player was killed by a Vehicle. Server-ID of driver: {0}.
metadata.secondary_touching: At the time of death the player was touching these vehicles: {0}.

detail.title: Detailed disconnect reason
detail.description: This will explain in more detail how user '{0}' left the game.

reasons.exited: The user exited the game by typing 'quit' in the F8 console or pressing ALT and F4 or similar.
reasons.disconnected: The user disconnected from the server by typing 'disconnect' in the F8 console or similar.
reasons.reloading_game: The user loaded a single-player game by using the 'localGame' command in the F8 console or similar.
reasons.crash: The users game crashed with the given error message.
reasons.timeout: The users connection to the server timed out. This is usually the case when internet connectivity drops out.
reasons.banned: The user was banned by a staff member with the give reason.
reasons.restart: The user was kicked by the server as it was restarting.
reasons.kicked: The user was kicked by a staff member with the given reason.
reasons.job: The users job priority expired. This means the user was in the queue too long for the job priority so the system kicked them out of the queue.
reasons.doors: The server tried to synchronize doors with the client but failed, so it kicked the user as it cannot recover from this error.
reasons.global: The system detected that the user was most likely doing something malicious and handed out a global OP-FW ban.
reasons.editor: The player opened their Rockstar Editor which automatically leaves the server you're currently in.
reasons.overflow: Safety measure by FiveM as a protection from cheaters spamming your server with events.
reasons.another: The user directly connected to another server without first disconnecting from this one.
reasons.config: While connecting the servers configuration was unable to load causing the user to get rejected.
reasons.unknown: No detailed description available. You can ask a developer for more help.

logs.damage_description: On this page you can view and filter the damage logs.
logs.hit_id_hint: Either the network or vehicle id, depending on which is available.
logs.victim_hint: Hint: Can be a license, network-id "N123" or vehicle-id "V123".
